overview: Itâ€™s New Years Eve and Santa is in trouble! He lost his new party hat and must find it before the New Years celebration! Enter best buddies Brooklyn the lion cub, Beezbee the tiny bee and Peanut the baby giraffe! The intrepid trio is ready to dive headfirst into a whole new adventure to find Santa's beloved hat! Will Brooklyn, Beezbee and Peanut find Santa's hat before the New Year's Dance party? Join the hunt to find out with New Years Dance 2!
title: New Years Dance 2
